titles.title: I am the bread of life (Version 1)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am the bread of life, broken for all.
Eat now and hunger no more.
One faith, one hope, one symbol of love
given to us in this one bread, one cup.
O let us be one in the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are my friends
if you keep my commands,
no longer servants but friends.
See how my people have nothing to eat.
Give them the bread that is you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As God has loved me
so I have loved you.
Go and live on in my love.
